resources.string: INSTRUCTIONS: Use the arrow keys to move around the map. As you move around, your HP will decrease. Also, entities with special abilities will randomly appear. The entity abilities will have various effects on your gameplay. Your goal is to last as long as you can.
Use the arrow keys to move around the map.
As you move around, your HP will decrease.
Also, entities with special abilities will randomly appear.
The entity abilities will have various effects on your gameplay.
Your goal is to last as long as you can.
BLOCKER (#): Decreases accessible areas on map.
REMOVER (+): Increases accessible areas on map.
